content.body: I've been tinkering with that idea I had about using `.{` as an RCU mechanism, trying to explore what `.{` could do, and I'm beginning to wish the JS "spread" operator was `foo...` and not `...foo` (as in "id on the right collects, id on the left produces").
content.formatted_body: I've been tinkering with that idea I had about using .{ as an RCU mechanism, trying to explore what .{ could do, and I'm beginning to wish the JS "spread" operator was foo... and not ...foo (as in "id on the right collects, id on the left produces").
